Publication_Title: A Plain System of Elocution, by G. Vandenhoff
Notes: Â  (second edition, New York) (Although this was an unauthorized reprint, it is the first appearance of the poem in a book. Later editions do not include the poem. It may have been removed by legal pressure.)

Publication_Title: The Raven and Other Poems
Notes: New York: Wiley and Putnam, 161 Broadway. The volume was initially issued separately with pink paper wraps. Beginning sometime early in 1846, it was issued in hard covers, bound together with the earlier Tales . The original sale price was 31 cents for the separate volume, and $1.00 for the double volume.
